title: I Can't HANDLE 360 FPS...
description: At CES 2020 Asus showed off their new ROG Swift 360 gaming display and much more.  I used Windows Vista in 2020 and it was a bad idea   We built the ULTIMATE PS4...kind of    Check out our new channel!  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
